channel.title: 317/508 Moneybag Command Help

item.title: 317/508 Moneybag Command Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Here’s something i just made xd, i remembered i couldn’t do it b4 because i was a nub but here…


package server.model.players.content;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import server.model.players.Client;

/**
 * 
 * 
 * @author Rodrigo(Imsuperman05)
 */
public class CashBag {

	static List<Integer> bag = new ArrayList<Integer>();
	
	public static List<Integer> getBag() {
		return bag;
	}
	
	public static void addToBag(Client c, int amount) {
		bag.add(amount);
		c.sendMessage("You add "+amount+" coins to your bag.");
	}
	
	public static void take(Client c, int amount) {
		bag.remove(amount);
		c.sendMessage("You take out "+amount+" coins from your bag.");
	}
	
	public static void clearbag(Client c) {
		bag.clear();
		c.sendMessage("You clear your bag.");
	}
}

Read full topic

You forgot to make it check to see if you have the money.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("moneybag")) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,100000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 100000000); c.getItems().addItem(10835, 1); c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You Recieved Your MoneyBag!</col>"); } else { c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You Need 100M To Recieve MoneyBag!</col>"); } }

This IS My Money Bag Command

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("moneybag")) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 100000000);
                            c.getItems().addItem(10835, 1);
                            c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You Recieved Your MoneyBag!</col>");
                    } else {
	c.sendMessage("<col=1532693>You Need 100M To Recieve MoneyBag!</col>");

}
It Works But The Problem Is if you dont have 100mil And type that command you still get a bag, Can someone help me so if you dont have the money you dont get the bag. Thanks
